title: Parameters for Voxel Based Compare Map Filter

distance_threshold.description: Threshold distance to compare input points with map points [m]

use_dynamic_map_loading.description: map loading mode selection, true for dynamic map loading, false for static map loading, recommended for no-split map pointcloud

downsize_ratio_z_axis.description: Positive ratio to reduce voxel_leaf_size and neighbor point distance threshold in z axis

map_update_distance_threshold.description: Threshold distance to update map points with input points [m]

timer_interval_ms.description: Timer interval to load map points [ms]
